span.span: Welcome to the Yellow Medicine East (YME) School District. All of us at YME are excited to serve our students, parents, and community in providing an excellent educational opportunity for all.

div.a: Read More about the superintendent's message

a.span: Yellow Medicine East Middle/High School building link

span.span: Welcome to Yellow Medicine East Middle School, home of the Sting!

Our Commitment at YME is to provide a safe, positive and intellectual learning
environment that will empower students to become creative problem solvers, critical thinkers, and inspired learners. Today’s generation of learners need to participate in activities that challenge and engage them, that help them develop important life skills, and prepare them for high school, college and life in the twenty-first century. We offer small class sizes and a large number of exploratory classes. We also offer a full menu of extra-curricular and co-curricular activities.

Fall of 2014, YME implemented “Ramp Up For Readiness,” a school-wide advisory program that features an engaging and interactive series of activities designed to help all students graduate from high school ready for post-secondary success. The “Ramp Up” outcomes are focused on the five pillars of readiness: academic, admissions, career, financial, personal & social readiness. “Ramp Up” helps students advance toward meeting those pillars as they progress through school. We believe students cannot be too prepared for their post high school transition, so we start focusing as early as the sixth grade. We, at YME, are passionate about education and want nothing more than to engage children in developing the knowledge and skills they need to be successful adults.

Welcome To Bert Raney Elementary! Bert Raney houses Early Childhood to 5th grade, with approximately 390 students. The average class size is 18 students. Students are provided with many different opportunities to grow and learn at their pace. We strive to ensure success for our students by providing quality instruction and a positive environment that promotes learning. We work to provide your child with the opportunity to grow and to develop for success in today’s world. We offer a variety of instructional programs to assist each child in his or her learning needs. We are honored that you have chosen to allow us to work with your child! To be successful in today’s world, all students need to be able to function in an appropriate manner behaviorally and socially. The primary grades are no exception and provide a sound base for future years. It is our responsibility to teach and guide students in behavioral conduct and to provide a safe, orderly environment allowing all students to learn. We stress the importance of being Safe, Respectful, and Responsible in all areas at BRE. We are so excited you are here!

i.i: Here at Yellow Medicine East Our Mission is:

i.b: To provide a caring environment of high expectations that prepares every student for a successful future and instills the value of learning.

span.strong: The vision here at YME is:

em.strong: The vision of the Yellow Medicine East Schools is to be a place that inspires students to achieve their fullest potential.
